item.title: New Videos on Tangent Spaces and Submanifolds
item.description: I have uploaded two new videos for the Multivarible Calculus revision series about submanifolds (which you can find under Resources): Part 2 - Tangent Spaces Part 3 - Level Sets as Submanifolds While the video on tangent spaces was relatively easy, the other video about level sets was much harder. It is a more difficult topic to explain, and it took me a while to find the right picture which will give everything in detail.

item.title: Revision Videos for Multivariable Calculus at Warwick
item.description: I have in the past few days uploaded some revision videos for the Multivariable Calculus course at Warwick (2020 – 2021) taught by Mario Micallef. You can find them under Resources. Currently, they contain references to “the notes”. I may update them at some later point, removing all such references. The point of the videos is not to go over the rigour and the proofs, but to give a higher level and intuitive view of the course.
